text: Anyone else also experiencing issues with CMS Hub while updating site as the changes aren’t reflecting for me
also had issues with HubDB not reflecting changes on the live site for the dynamic content

Hi, We're a development agency and I want to use HubSpot as a registration system of what (version of) software my customers are using. So I can email them if there are updates or interesting modules. What is the best way to go here ?
anyone have any idea how to use this field? It shows up when pulling modules with the CLI. tried "50%" "HALF"
I kind of like <@U7V9DQ31P>’s guess that it might have to do with the custom responsive breakpoints they’re working on. But no, no idea how or if we can actually use it yet.
Site Tree question: is there any way to move pages around into a structure in the site tree if they were created outside of the site tree?
Hmmm I would love if it does what I think it does. To achieve something like this

Has anyone built an integration between HubSpot and <http://Outreach.io|Outreach.io> (that includes - Owners / Activities + Timelines / Calls / Conversations / Tasks /Sequences)?
Also, if I were to build this out of necessity, any pitfalls to watch out for?

This might be because of the cache on HubSpot server side. Also, it depends on the way the changes have been made. Is it locally, or in Design Manager?

You may try adding this `hsDebug=true` to the url
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/debugging-and-errors#hsdebug-true>
